channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health Datatype Description Many general services that SoftLayer provides are tracked on the customer portal with a quick status message. These status message provide users with a quick reference to the health of a service, whether it’s up or down. These services include SoftLayer’s Internet backbone connections, VPN entry points, and router networks. The SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health data type provides the relationship between these services and their health status. Local createDate The date that a service's status was created.
